类的使用
org.springframework.test.web.servlet.htmlunit.MockMvcWebClientBuilder

  • 使用MockMvcWebClientBuilder的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.test.web.servlet.htmlunit
    Server-side support for testing Spring MVC applications with MockMvc and HtmlUnit.

    • org.springframework.test.web.servlet.htmlunit中MockMvcWebClientBuilder的使用

      返回MockMvcWebClientBuilder的org.springframework.test.web.servlet.htmlunit中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static MockMvcWebClientBuilder MockMvcWebClientBuilder.mockMvcSetup(MockMvc mockMvc)
      Create a new MockMvcWebClientBuilder based on the supplied MockMvc instance.
      static MockMvcWebClientBuilder MockMvcWebClientBuilder.webAppContextSetup(WebApplicationContext context)
      Create a new MockMvcWebClientBuilder based on the supplied WebApplicationContext.
      static MockMvcWebClientBuilder MockMvcWebClientBuilder.webAppContextSetup(WebApplicationContext context, MockMvcConfigurer configurer)
      Create a new MockMvcWebClientBuilder based on the supplied WebApplicationContext and MockMvcConfigurer.
      MockMvcWebClientBuilder MockMvcWebClientBuilder.withDelegate(com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.WebClient webClient)
      Supply the WebClient that the client built by this builder should delegate to when processing non-matching requests.
